name: Geometry.io Dash - White Color Shapes Switch
name_original: Geometry.io Dash - White Color Shapes Switch
description:
Leap into the orbits and drift through the geometry shapes. A great addictive world full of geometry shapes.

How to play :
Tap to escape the shapes avoiding the rotating dots on geometry shapes. Boom through the rotating shapes and avoid the collision with the dots revolving around.

It’s a simpler yet addictive one-touch gameplay. Try it!!
